item.title: PlayStation's Big Black Friday Sale Includes Deals On PS5 Consoles, Games, And PS Plus
item.content:encoded:
https://kotaku.com/playstation-psn-ps5-black-friday-deals-ps-plus-games-1851706224

It’s late in November, so its time for another big Black Friday sale. Sure, Black Friday used to be a day, but now it’s spread out over two weeks. And PlayStation is the latest big company to offer a bunch of discounts as we get closer to Thanksgiving.

On November 22, Sony flipped the big switch (at least I assume it’s controlled by a big switch) and activated a ton of deals on digital games, consoles, controllers, PSVR2 headsets, and more across PSN and PlayStation Direct. Like with Xbox’s Black Friday blowout sale, there are far too many deals to list out everything on sale. Instead, here are some of the best PlayStation Black Friday we found digging through the massive sale.

Most of the following deals expire on December 2, so don’t wait too long to snag what you want.

First up, Sony has temporarily discounted the price of the PS5 Slim by $75. The version that comes with a disc drive is marked down to $425 and the digital-only model is $375.

If you’re looking for a PSVR2 headset, Sony has dropped the price on it by a whopping $250. You can pick up either the PSVR2 or the bundle that includes Horizon: Call of the Mountain for $350. Just be warned that using this headset on your PC, while doable, is a bit of mess for various reasons.

Meanwhile, Sony is also offering discounts on PS Plus Premium and Extra 12-month subscriptions. I was able to upgrade my existing base tier subscription, which runs out in about 9 months, to a Premium plan for just $36.
